0.text: Bug 134444  Locale setting lost when change current page with internal bookmark.

1.text: Description: Locale setting lost when change current page with internal bookmark  Steps to reproduce: 1.

3.text: Add bookmark in the first label 3.

4.text: In the second label,set internal bookmark link to the first label, set page-break-before to always.

6.text: In preference, set Locale to a different locale.

8.text: Preview in Web Viewer, go to the second page and click the link.

9.text: Expected result: Locale setting in webaddress keeps unchanged.

10.text: Actual result: After click the link, Locale setting lost in webaddress.
